name: Malik
description:
Happy Christmas Malik!

This game is for a young man named Malik, who was interested in becoming a game designer. I've thrown together some technical info, tips on getting started and things I wish someone had told me when I was starting out. 

Whilst this was made for someone in particular, I hope anyone who comes across this game finds it real helpful!

CONTROLS:

WASD: move player

Mouse: Control camera

NOTES:

-Game is also playable with ps4 controller, semi playable with other gamepads

-Slight bug with mouse - if cursor is visible it can restrict camera movement, if this happens, click the game window until cursor disappears.

Merry Christmas!

Harry
